title: Chapter 4308 - Chapter 4308: 4307 Spirit Kneading Method
body:
Chapter 4308 - Chapter 4308: 4307 Spirit Kneading Method

Chapter 4308: 4307 spirit kneading method

Translator: 549690339

“Hehe, let’s see if there are any treasures in this dog’s corpse.”

Song Ta flew to Wang Xian’s side and said while staring at the corpse of the spirit kneading man with a fiery gaze!

“Search it!”

Wang Xian smiled. Under his sensing, he took out a spatial treasure from the spirit kneading man’s body.

Then, he opened it directly.

“Gan, there are so few treasures. There are only some fragments of the Elemental God. There isn’t even a heaven-origin creation-level treasure!”

Song Ta couldn’t help but Grumble as he sensed the treasures inside!

Wang Xian smiled. There were quite a number of treasures in the spiritual kneader’s storage space.

There were more than a dozen fragments of the Elemental God. Their value wasn’t low at all!

There was also a recording tablet. It contained some divine herbs and divine fruits that were extremely useful to powerhouses in the heaven-origin creation-level.

This was quite a lot of resources.

However, Wang Xian and the rest were of a high level. Therefore, these treasures were not of much use to them!

There were no unexpected surprises!

“Divide them according to their value.”

Wang Xian took out all the treasures and took out the recording tablet.

When he sensed the contents on the recording tablet, he narrowed his eyes slightly.

“This is the recording tablet of the spiritual kneader’s creation of creatures. There are records of his research on creatures with ten attributes on it!”

Wang Xian scanned through the huge amount of information on it and spoke to Old Man Song Pagoda Jian!

“Oh, is that so?”

Both Old Man Song Pagoda Jian and Old Man Song Pagoda Jian immediately looked over.

“The spiritual kneader’s specialty is to create powerful demonic spirits and powerful creatures. He once created a demonic spirit at the heaven’s fate level.”

Old Man sword said, “There is no record of him creating a demon spirit on this record tablet. There is only a record of him creating creatures.”

“The spirit kneader would not use a secret technique like creating a demon spirit on himself. I think he would imprint it in his mind. After all, this is his specialty. However, this guy’s method of creating creatures is also very powerful.”

Song ta nodded his head. “Let’s Make a copy of this information. Each of us will get a copy. On it, we will create creatures with ten attributes. It is used by this fellow to search for treasures in the cross primordial spirit region. To a certain extent, the effect is better than us fishing.”

Wang Xian nodded his head. He was also very curious about the method of creating creatures with ten attributes that the spirit kneader used.

He felt that this secret method should be of great benefit to him.

Following that, Wang Xian looked at the position of his right arm.

There was a creature hidden in his right arm.

It was a creature that looked like a giant python.

It was not dead yet. Instead, it was stored in his arm. The entire creature was very long.

However, it only had the combat strength of an Emperor God.

“I want to study the creature inside the corpse of the spiritual pinch man!”

Wang Xian spoke to Song Ta and Geezer Jian.

“No problem. It’s just a small toy.”

Geezer song ta and Geezer Jian nodded nonchalantly.

Following that, the three of them began to divide the corpse of the spiritual pinch man.

According to the distribution of energy, Wang Xian took up half of it while the other half belonged to Song Ta and Geezer Jian.

They also distributed the resources of the spirit kneader.

“I still have five pieces of the god of elements fragments here. I’ll take one away first. There’s also a fire attribute treasure.”

Song Ta took out the treasure that he obtained from the cross-shaped primordial spirit region and distributed it among them.

“The fire attribute treasure can be absorbed. It contains the good fortune of the fire attribute. There’s a high possibility that it can allow a ruler at the peak of the realm to touch the good fortune of the Tian Yuan realm. This fire attribute treasure is the most precious.”

Song Ta continued, holding the fire-type treasure, he said, “There are not many fire-type treasures in my disciple’s possession. If there is a need, the three of us will take out some elemental god fragments to exchange for them. If none of us want them, we will sell them at the market price.”

“I want them!”

Wang Xian looked at the fire-type energy gem. His eyes sparkled as he immediately bought it.

This fire elemental gemstone was worth a lot!

It was a great fortune for a fire elemental master!

At the moment, Wang Xian wanted to nurture some heaven origin powerhouses from the Dragon Palace. This gemstone was definitely a rare existence.

Its value was even higher than two to three pieces of the god of elements fragment!

One must know that the value of the god of elements fragment was not low.

They might have obtained five pieces easily.

However, this was due to the change in the riot zone and Song Ta had discovered it by accident.

In addition, in order to obtain these five pieces of God of elements fragments, three existences at the level of the Great Dao were mobilized.

This was especially so for Wang Xian, who was not an ordinary powerhouse at the level of the Great Dao.

“Haha, Good, good. We have a good cooperation this time!”

After the three of them shared all the resources, Song Ta said loudly happily.

Even the stern old sword who was in his sword form revealed a smile.

The gains this time far exceeded the gains they had made in the past 30 to 40 billion years!

“If there’s a chance, we can continue to work together!”

Wang Xian smiled and nodded his head. He was also very satisfied.

This half-corpse of a spiritual kneader was twice as much as what he had gained from hunting the space beasts in the universe.

“Haha, Alright, Alright. Brother Wang Xian, your strength is stronger than all of us. If there’s a chance, let’s work together!”

The joint battle had also brought their relationship closer.

“I’ll find a place to study something. We’ll contact each other if there’s anything!”

Wang Xian chatted with them for a while before leaving.

He was prepared to study some methods to create creatures with ten attributes.

He wanted to see if he could gain anything from it!

“He’s very strong. He’s an existence that has reached the level of two great daos. The energy in his body is also extremely abundant.”

Looking at the place where Wang Xian disappeared, song Ta’s eyes flickered as he spoke.

“His original form is not human. I wonder which universe he came from!”

Old Man Jian spoke, “There are still many strong beings in the Chaos!”

“HMM, there isn’t any strong killing intent from him. At the moment, he is still amiable!”

Song ta nodded his head.

At their level, there were some things that they had to pay attention to.

Wang Xian did not continue to stay at the location of the cross-shaped primordial spirit. Instead, he flew towards the back.

A few days later, he arrived at the path where there were no energy attacks. With a wave of his arm, a palace appeared there.

Wang Xian stepped into the palace.

It was easier for him to search for treasures in other places than in the region of the primordial spirit of the cross.

Therefore, Wang Xian did not plan to stay there any longer.

However, now that he had obtained the method to create ten types of elemental creatures, he could do some research.

If he could succeed in his research, Wang Xian could return to the region of the primordial spirit of the cross.

After all, the level of the treasures in the cross primordial spirit was the highest.

When he arrived at the palace, Wang Xian took out the recording tablet and read the records on it.

The records on the tablet were the research process, research plan, and research direction of the spirit kneader.

Wang Xian could totally conduct research based on the records on it.
